title: The juiciest new Apple rumours
text:
Here is what to expect from Apple’s iPhone 6s, 6s Plus, iPad Pro and revamped Apple TV MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au Here is what to expect from Apple’s iPhone 6s, 6s Plus, iPad Pro and revamped Apple TV MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au What to expect from the Apple event 1:49 
It's September, which means it's time for Apple to launch their latest range of products. January 1st 1970 46 years ago /video/video.news.com.au/News/ 
RUMOURS have been circulating for months about the release of Apple’s next iPhone and in less than 24 hours all will be revealed. 
The announcement is set to take place in the largest venue ever used by the tech giant for a product launch — San Francisco’s Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. 
While Apple is yet to confirm whether leaked detail about its new products is true, what we do know is Apple is set to unveil the iPhone 6s and 6s Plus, a new look iPad and upgraded Apple TV at the annual September event. Apple is working hard to increase camera capabilities. The leaked front of the iPhone 6s, which likely has sapphire glass (Credit: Sonny Dickson) Seeing battery life staying in the green for longer is a welcome change. The new iPad would dwarf Apple’s already existing tablets. Apple TV will come with an awesome remote allowing for voice activated commands. The leaked rear of the iPhone 6s. No changes to size. (Credit: Sonny Dickson) Tomorrow's World 49:42 
A dizzying journey into the mind-bending world technology is now creating for us - welcome to the forefront of pure innovation. What will the world of tomorrow be like? August 14th 2015 /video/video.news.com.au/TV/Current Affairs/ Tomorrow's World A dizzying journey into the mind-bending world technology is now creating for us - welcome to the forefront of pure innovation. What will the world of tomorrow be like? 1 of n 
Here’s what could be in store.
